definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: The machine gun hailed over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 機關槍的火力壓得我們擡不起頭來。

sentences.english: It features two fire-linked laser cannons chin-mounted on the ball-shaped cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 它有兩門火力同步激光炮被安裝在球型駕駛艙下部。

sentences.english: The strength of the stove firepower can be adjusted by the switch on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 竈頭火力大小可通過調節竈頭開關，任意調節。

sentences.english: The enemy were mowed down with machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 敵人被機槍的火力掃倒。

sentences.english: And I was sure that, sooner or later, Perot, too, would turn his fire on me.
sentences.chinese: 我也十分清楚，佩羅遲早也會把火力對準我。

sentences.english: The front row of soldiers were mown down by machinegun fire.
sentences.chinese: 最前面的一排士兵被機槍火力掃射倒了。

sentences.english: The speed and decent power of the Pitbull makes it an opportune tool to pick off some husks quickly.
sentences.chinese: 鬥犬的速度和火力使它成爲迅速清除外殼的好工具。

sentences.english: Now they were coming after me, and I had to hang on.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們都把火力對準了我，我必須堅持到底。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流溼式冷卻塔的節水是火力發電廠節水工作的關鍵。

sentences.english: Coal-fired power plants are factories of death.
sentences.chinese: 燒煤的火力發電廠堪稱死亡工廠。

sentences.english: Loyalist forces using tanks and rockets outgunned the rebel groups.
sentences.chinese: 扎卡菲擁護者使用坦克和火箭重火力壓倒了反對者。

sentences.english: The development and status of condensers for thermal power plants in China was described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了我國火力發電站用冷凝管的發展和現狀。

sentences.english: Yuke landing force assault squadron provide fire support to the amphibious force.
sentences.chinese: 進攻中隊，爲兩棲軍提供火力支援。

sentences.english: The mortar position should be protected from direct-fire weapons as best as possible.
sentences.chinese: 迫擊炮位應儘量避開敵軍直接火力打擊。

sentences.english: The officer orders the soldiers to plough on in spite of heavy enemy gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 軍官命令土兵們冒着敵人的火力繼續進攻前進。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
